title.value: К вопросу повышения производительности и снижения удельных энергозатрат вальцовой плющилки зерна
Increasing of productivity and reducing of specific energy consumption of roller grain crusher
Increasing of productivity and reducing of specific energy consumption of roller grain crusher

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Prishchepova, E.M., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Modern feeding technologies suppose grain flattening, executed with the help of special technological equipment – roller grain crushing machine. The main problem proposed to be solved in the article appears analysis of the influence of constructive parameters of the equipment on its working capacity and fuel consumption. The results of theoretical and experimental studies of the performance and specific energy consumption of the roller grain crushing machine depending on its design and technological parameters are presented in the article. Graphs, reflecting the variances of specific productivity and energy consumption of roller grain crushing machine depending on different characteristics (pressure, rotating speed, crusher setting's width) are displayed.
